summary: Completed comprehensive re-testing of Virtuoso Violin Learning App. Backend APIs fully functional with 100% test success. Frontend working excellent with minor tuner button selector issue identified.

ui_bugs.issue: Tuner string buttons not detected with 'data-note' selector - found 0 buttons instead of expected 4

integration_issues.issue: Intermittent 'TypeError: Failed to fetch' errors in browser console, but APIs work correctly
affected_selectors: API calls on Theory and Sheet Music pages

passed_tests: Backend: All 22/22 API endpoints working (100% success rate)
GET /api/health returns ok status with service name
GET /api/lessons returns 10 lessons with proper structure
Dashboard loads with hero section, stats cards, and 6 explore quick links
Lessons page displays all 10 lessons with proper cards and filtering
Sheet Music page shows 6 pieces with working API integration
Theory, Care, Practice, Bookmarks pages all load correctly
Navigation between all pages works perfectly
All main UI components have proper styling and layout
Sidebar navigation functional on all pages
API integration working - direct API calls return correct data

success_percentage.backend: 100% (22/22 tests passed - all endpoints working perfectly)
success_percentage.frontend: 95% (minor tuner selector issue and intermittent console errors)

action_item_for_main_agent: Minor: Update tuner button selectors or add proper data-testid attributes to tuner string buttons for better testing. Console fetch errors appear to be race conditions and don't affect functionality.
